name: HullBreach
description:
Credits - Dylan Stilwell (Programming all systems unrelated to audio) 

Marcy Nabors (All audio including music and sounds)

Ceasar Villeages (All art, including most UI art)

Recommended: Level 1 is the most buggy, we recommend playing on the sandbox level for the most part as that was what our vision was towards.

Controls: WASD - Moving

RMB - Repair Holes

LMB - Fire

WARNING; THIS GAME HAS  LOTS OF BUGS INCLUDING LACK OF LOSE CONDITION IN SOME AREAS
